title: threatening to hack your account
body:
over the past 2 years playing league it has happened to me multiple times that you occasionally end up in a bad game or with bad teammates.
some people are toxic af jaja but where i personally draw the line is when people start threatening to hack your account, hack your computer and hack your personal information. insta feed in my games np i can just play another game after that. but start cross referencing my ip adress and hacking my personal info that is where it crosses from against terms of use to against the law.
riot.. i report when these things happen, but nothing ever seems to be done about it.
empty threats or actual threats is irrelevant, this should be 0 tolerance 100% perma bannable.
i am NOT here to get harrased by hackers. i am here ti have fun
ty

replies.body: Hey that is really scary, and I promise we take things like this very seriously.  Due to privacy liabilities, though, we aren't able to share the outcome of our investigation.  Continue reporting these cases, but you may also want to consider contacting local authorities if there are cases where you personally feel unsafe.
